name: Eagle Fish Hunting
description:
Hunting in the vast sea may be a fun challenge, Control the Flight of an eagle on the deep blue sea continue monitoring the movement of fish under water hunt all fishes try to shoot as much as you can and increase coins

Touch your mobile device to control the flight of an eagle flying on the blue sea and monitor the direction of fish, your fish cannon will fire net to catch fish on its way. catch all the fish within the time of life and get rewarded with coins and finish the bottom line of hunting fish
Game features:
• A real life experience of shooting and hunting Fish
• HD 3-D graphics
• different size and breeds of fish
